name: My precious little bullet
description:
A simple game for the Trijam #133: The three hour game jam.

Your precious little bullet has been shot (out of a cannon). Guide it towards a safe place.

Commands: Drag and drop to build platforms for your precious bullet to bounce.

Changelog: 

- Fixed ball always starting at the same angle regardless of where it was shot from.

- Added webgl build and fixed camera aspect ratio issues
